subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: In Sylvia Fowles, the Lady Tigers have a player who is beginning to realize her full potential. With great agility and a spacious wingspan, she anchors the nation’s top scoring defense.
snippet: In Sylvia Fowles, the Lady Tigers have a player who is beginning to realize her full potential. With great agility and a spacious wingspan, she anchors the nation’s top scoring defense.
